text.title: Hello, I'm Yassine.
parag: Experienced self-taught developer with over <bold>5+ years</bold> of crafting advanced SaaS products and B2B solutions, specializing in transforming imaginative designs into robust, scalable web solutions that set new standards.
I love building tools that are <bold>user friendly, simple</bold> and <bold>delightful</bold>.

Through these experiences, I had the opportunity to work with both small and large companies, as well as specialized and cross-functional teams across different time zones & developed a working style that prioritizes <bold>flexibility, clarity</bold> and <bold>collaboration</bold>.
I'm currently looking for a new role as a developer. <link>Hire me?</link>

skills.title: My Skills
skills.description: Explore my range of technical skills, from front-end design to back-end development, showcasing my ability to build efficient, modern, and user-friendly web solutions.

projects.title: My Projects
projects.description: Discover a selection of my most impactful projects, highlighting my expertise in full-stack development, modern UI design, and efficient web architecture.

descriptions.selfiecadeau: An online store that allows users to customize affordable gifts with photos, text, and designs. Features include product management, coupon system, and automated email notifications.
descriptions.sydigital: A modern digital agency website showcasing services in web design, SEO, and branding, with a sleek interface and responsive design.
descriptions.blogify: A blogging platform that enables users to create, manage, and share blog posts easily, including admin management, image uploads, and tag systems.
descriptions.apprentis: A language tutoring center website offering information on courses, teachers, and registration with multilingual support and a clean design.
descriptions.msmvoyages: A travel agency website designed to present destinations, packages, and online inquiries with a focus on simplicity and elegance.
